snippet.title: Hide the Corpse - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Hide the Corpse is a VR physics-based puzzle game developed by Realcast. Players must grab, drag, and contort the body and objects you find around the environment to stash the body in one of the available hiding places before the place is crawling with cops. Hide the body in the allotted time across 10 levels and 60 hiding spots. Hide the Corpse Kickstarter is available to support now with a demo available now for Meta Quest.

#IGN
